sentence.Network_en: He devoured her with his eyes , ie looked at her lustfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用色迷迷的目光盯着她.

sentence.Network_en: He looked at the young woman lustfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 他色迷迷地看着这位年轻的女士.

sentences.sentence: "he looked at the young woman lustfully"

auth_sentence.content: But I say to you that every man who looks at a woman lustfully has already committed adultery with her - in his heart.
auth_sentence.res_content: But I say to you that every man who looks at a woman lustfully has already committed adultery with her - in his heart.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But I say to you that every man who looks at a woman lustfully has already committed adultery with her - in his heart.

auth_sentence.content: Every now and then, I peered out, hoping to see her door slowly opening, hoping to see her lustfully scurrying my way.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every now and then, I peered out, hoping to see her door slowly opening, hoping to see her lustfully scurrying my way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every now and then, I peered out, hoping to see her door slowly opening, hoping to see her lustfully scurrying my way.
